Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Hawkers Yard will be home to seven high-specification units, offering flexible floor space and generous eaves height (up to 10m) in a prime west London location, close to the A40.

Each occupier will benefit from best-in-class design, purpose-built for efficiency providing a comfortable working environment, with high-speed broadband connectivity and leading energy-saving technologies. Your new hub’s location is second to none, with exceptional transport links to central London, the UK and overseas.
